content: Please take a look at FHIR#34002 and add comments. The Observation resource is normative, and if we relax the cardinality of Observation.specimen to 0..* that will change the wire format and break backward compatibility for JSON. We need to consider the options and determine what we think is the best way to handle this.
.... so does changing datatypes from codeable to codeablereference as suggested in other trackers... right?
